import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Product } from '../models/product'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.css'] }) export class CartComponent { // when components load, get cart from local storage cart = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart') || '[]'); constructor() { //localStorage.setItem('cart', '[]'); console.table(this.cart); } ngOnInit(): void { } removeFromCart(product: Product) { let cart = []; cart = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart') || `{ ${product.id} : ${0} }`); let quantity = cart[product.id] || 0; quantity -= 1; if (quantity <= 0) { delete cart[product.id] } else { cart[product.id] = quantity; } console.table(cart); localStorage.setItem('cart', JSON.stringify(cart)); } }
